solution_line_template: June had {june_initial_stickers} stickers and was given {grandparents_gift_each} from her grandparents so she had {june_initial_stickers} + {grandparents_gift_each} = <<{june_initial_stickers}+{grandparents_gift_each}={june_total_stickers}>>{june_total_stickers} stickers

Bonnie had {bonnie_initial_stickers} stickers and was given {grandparents_gift_each} from her grandparents so she had {bonnie_initial_stickers} + {grandparents_gift_each} = <<{bonnie_initial_stickers}+{grandparents_gift_each}={bonnie_total_stickers}>>{bonnie_total_stickers} stickers

June had {june_total_stickers} stickers and Bonnie had {bonnie_total_stickers} stickers so together, they had {june_total_stickers} + {bonnie_total_stickers} = <<{june_total_stickers}+{bonnie_total_stickers}={combined_stickers}>>{combined_stickers} stickers
